===Etymology===
kamupe → kampe → kaube → koːbe. Compound of {{compound|神|tr1=kamu|t1=god|戸|tr2=he|t2=house|lang=ja}}. Originally referred to a house belonging to the Ikuta Shrine.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|こうべ|acc=a|acc_ref=R:NHK Hatsuon}}

===Proper noun===
{{ja-pos|こうべ|proper|hhira=かうべ}}

# [[Kobe]], a [[city]] in [[Hyōgo]] Prefecture, [[Japan]]
